title: St Marianne Cope Novena
description: St Marianne Cope was a Franciscan nun accepted a request to move to Hawaii and serve the lepers there, and did so for the rest of her life, following in the footsteps of St Damien of Molokai. Pray this novena for lepers, outcasts, those with HIV/AIDS, and Hawaii.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Lord Jesus, your faithful servant St Marianne Cope lovingly served the outcasts of the world, especially those afflicted with leprosy. Through her heroic example and powerful intercession before your throne in Heaven, I ask for the grace of (mention request here‚Ä¶) Help me to imitate her generosity and self-sacrifice, offering my sufferings in union with yours and seeking to help those whom the world has shunned. St Marianne Cope, pray for us.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
